price: Just as your Lord brought you [O Prophet] out of your home for a just cause[2], even though a group of believers were averse to it.
arabic: كَمَآ أَخۡرَجَكَ رَبُّكَ مِنۢ بَيۡتِكَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَإِنَّ فَرِيقٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ لَكَٰرِهُونَ
footnotes: [2] It is referring to the Battle of Badr.
